title: Classical conditioning study set - research method

content.question: Which of the following statements most accurately describes why this study is an experiment?

choices.label: The researchers operationally defined the variables.
The participants were randomly assigned to one of two groups.
The sample was representative of the population being observed.

content.answer: The participants were randomly assigned to one of two groups.

skill.text: 2.A: Determine the type of research design(s) used in a given study.
